display_long_description:
# March 2025 Update 3.7
The neighborhood has never felt more alive! Now you can explore at night and meet a lively cast of neighbors who chat with each other and strike up conversations with you in fun, unexpected ways. Your roommate can now join you for a swim in the pool, and the wardrobe has expanded with stylish new clothing, hairstyles, and dresses. Plus, performance and visual upgrades make everything smoother and sharper!

[media]

# January 2025 Update 3.0
Welcome to Oasis City 🌴, your ultimate coastal escape in AI Roommate! Explore a vibrant beach metropolis, meet colorful characters, dance at a music festival, or test your skills at the Arcade. Dive into crystal-clear waters, soak up the sun, and enjoy the lively energy of this seaside paradise!

[media]

# A Home Full of Surprises
AI Roommate transforms your home into a space of endless possibilities. Every conversation can shift from light-hearted banter to something deeper—or even a bit... unexpected. Your smart, adaptive roommate ensures life is never the same two days in a row.

[media]

# Go Farther, Dream Bigger
Step outside and explore a neighborhood full of quirky personalities or take your roommate on exciting adventures. Watch a cozy movie at the cinema or dive into the vibrant energy of Oasis City, where fun, mystery, and surprises await at every turn. AI Roommate makes every moment unforgettable!

 Some content and features, including Oasis City, require an AI Roommate Plus subscription.
